store_recovery_codes: Store these recovery codes securely in a password manager. If you lose access to your two-factor authentication device, these codes can help you regain account access.

experience: A new experience of language learning with
smart_tool: With our smart tool, learn languages in a modern and user-friendly way and connect with the world.
about_text: At Modern Dictionary, we believe that learning a language can be simple, engaging, and fully user-friendly. Our mission is to provide a complete and advanced platform that allows you to not only learn languages quickly and naturally but also improve your language skills by learning words in different categories, levels, and even various grammar rules. With our smart translator, you can translate your words and sentences and easily communicate with the world around you.
beyond_translation: Modern Dictionary is more than just a translation tool. We focus on practical and interactive language learning, making every effort to enhance user experience. Our team has worked hard to elevate UI and UX to a new level. Additionally, we utilize top translators who not only provide accurate and up-to-date translations but also actively contribute to the project by sharing specialized words and phrases, helping learners deepen their understanding. These translators play a significant role in improving the quality of education and creating a unique experience.
growth: 250% growth in positive feedback – Our continuous successes and positive user feedback indicate that we are on the right path.
languages: 150+ available languages – We have managed to offer more than 150 different languages on our platform, allowing users to easily learn their desired language.
daily_users: 5000+ daily active users – Thousands of users from around the world use Modern Dictionary for language learning and follow our regular updates.
review_1: "Modern Dictionary has created a real transformation in language learning. Its accurate translations and interactive teaching provide an innovative and efficient experience for learners."
review_2: "The use of top translators on this platform not only improves translations but also helps learners gain a deeper understanding of grammar and idioms."
review_3: "With its advanced tools and active participation of professional translators, Modern Dictionary creates a dynamic and engaging environment that challenges and inspires users."
team_text: The Modern Dictionary team, using the latest tools and technologies, strives to provide the best possible experience for language learners.
aboutUs_subscribe: Subscribe to our newsletter to stay informed about the latest news, new features, and free updates. Join now and enjoy exclusive benefits!
how_to_become_translator: How can I contribute as a translator in Modern Dictionary?
translator_registration: You can register in the translators' section and start contributing by translating and defining words. Each of your contributions is recorded under your name and can serve as a professional resume in language learning and education.
how_to_gain_social_credit: How can I gain social credibility as a language learner?
social_credit_explanation: Every word you add or contribute to will be displayed in your profile, and other users can follow you. As your contributions increase, your name will be listed among the top translators, establishing you as a language expert.
team_translation: Can I work as a team on translations and word definitions?
team_translation_explanation: Yes! We provide an engaging and advanced platform for teamwork, allowing you to collaborate with friends on word collections and enjoy the group learning experience.
types_of_contributions: What types of contributions can I make?
contribution_explanation: You can add new words, edit existing descriptions, write example sentences, and even submit audio or visual translations.
how_to_learn: How can I learn languages in different ways using Modern Dictionary?
learning_methods:
Modern Dictionary offers three learning models:
- Learning words based on thematic categories (e.g., travel, business, technology, etc.)
- Level-based learning (from beginner to advanced, focusing on necessary grammar and vocabulary at each level)
- Learning through games and interaction (interactive exercises, picture tests, and language competitions).
how_to_contact_translator: How can I contact someone who has defined a word?
contact_translator_explanation: In Modern Dictionary, the name and profile of the translator who defined or translated a word are displayed. You can follow them, ask them questions, or even learn alongside them.
language_level_test: How can I assess my language level in Modern Dictionary?
level_test_explanation: You can take a placement test to determine your level and identify areas that need improvement.
daily_tests: What are daily tests, and how do they help me?
daily_tests_explanation: Daily tests include short quizzes on commonly used words that help reinforce memory and expand vocabulary.
word_tests: What are word tests, and why should I take them?
word_tests_explanation: These tests consist of short questions that help you review new words and reinforce your learning.
is_dictionary_just_a_dictionary: Is Modern Dictionary just a regular dictionary?
dictionary_features: No! Modern Dictionary has a smart translator that can translate words and sentences not only from text but also from voice, images, and even text files. This tool helps you easily translate texts and gain a deeper understanding of the language.
image_translation: How can I use the image translation feature?
image_translation_explanation: You can upload an image containing text and receive its translation. This feature is useful for reading texts on signs, books, and even restaurant menus!
sentence_translation: Can I translate my own sentences and share them with others?
sentence_translation_explanation: Yes! You can enter your sentences, receive their translations, and even add your suggested translations to the dictionary for others to benefit from.
translators_questions: Questions related to translators and contributors
tests_questions: Questions related to exams and language proficiency assessment
translation_features_questions: Questions related to translation capabilities and smart translator
